item.title: Chest reward?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I downloaded a client and founded this about a chest that gives you a reward , how can I see what chest it is?

case 38:
sendStatement(“Congratulations, you open the chest and got a reward!”);
c.nextChat = 0;
break;

case 37:
sendStatement(“You need atleast 1 free inventory spaces! and a crystal key!”);
c.nextChat = 0;
break;
